CAPACITY: 36MT

TANK CAPACITIES
CARGO HOLD (GRAIN, INCLUDING HATCH COAMINGS): ABT. 78,774.9M3
HEAVY FUEL OIL TANKS (INCLUDING SETTING AND SERVICE TANK)(100% FULL): ABT. 2,012.87M3
DIESEL OIL TANKS (INCLUDING SERVICE TANK)(100% FULL): ABT. 111.87M3

(INCLUDING NO. 3 HOLD)(100% FULL) ABT. 33,058.2M3
MAXIMUM 85% OF BUNKERS CAPACITY CAN BE USED.
HATCH COVERS
CARGO HATCH COVER TO BE WEATHER‐TIGHT DOUBLE SKIN FOLDING TYPE WITH FLAT TOP AND OUT‐PLACED HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS.
HATCHWAY SIZE
NO.1 HATCHWAY (L W): 19.68M × 18.26M
NO.2 – 5 HATCHWAY (L W): 22.96M× 18.26M
THE MAXIMUM ALLOWABLE TANK TOP LOADING:
IN NO.1, 3 & 5 CARGO HOLDS 25T/M2
IN NO.2&4 CARGO HOLDS 20T/M2
MAIN PROPULSION PLANT
TYPE AND NUMBER MAN B&W 5S60ME‐C8.2 (TIER II)
CMCR OUTPUT 8050KW
REVOLUTION 89 R/MIN
CSR (85%CMCR) OUTPUT 6842.5KW
REVOLUTION 84.3 R/MIN
SPEED & CONSUMPTION
VESSEL SPEED AND CONSUMPTION AS PER BELOW:
ABT 12.5K (L)/ ABT 13.0K (B) ON ABT 23.5 MTS IFO 380CST
ABT 12.0K (L) /ABT 12.5 (B) ON ABT 21.0 MTS IFO 380CST
ALL SPEED/CONSUMPTIONS BASIS SMOOTH SEAS/CALM WATER WIND FORCE UN-EXCEEDING B/F SCALE " 4 "（UN-EXCEEDING16 KNOTS）
DOUGLAS SEA STATE " 3 " ,AND TOTAL COMBINED(SEA AND SWELL) SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGH UN-EXCEEDING 1.25 M ,WITHOUT ANY ADVERSE CURRENT.
“ABT” MEANS HAVING AN ALLOWANCE OF +/- 0.5 KNOT ON SPEED AND 5 PCT INCREASE ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION
IN PORT:
IDLE – 2.3 MT IFO AUX ENG + 1.0 MT IFO FOR BOILER + 0.2MT MLSMGO
WORKING – 4.0 MT IFO AUX ENG + 1.0 MT IFO FOR BOILER + 0.2MT MLSMGO
VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO USE MDO/MGO FOR MANEUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING / LEAVING PORTS AND ADVERSE WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD IS LOWER THAN 50% IN PORT IDLE. VESSEL ALSO HAS THE LIBERTY TO USE MGO IN HER GENERATORS /AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS AND DURING THE PERIOD OF MAINTENANCE FOR THE BOILER.
ALL DETAILS ABOVE GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH / WOG
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
